data.Name: Bear Grillz
data.Bio: Proving that opposable thumbs or a basic grasp of the human language are not necessary prerequisites for EDM domination, allow us to introduce to you Bear Grillz. He's certainly not your standard 28 year-old grizzly bear... Hailing from Yosemite National Park, Grillz's story begins on a typical afternoon spent growling at marmots and eating tourists. While busy trying to digest one particularly tricky mountain climber, he discovered amongst his possessions something called a 'MacBook Pro'. Read more on Last.fm
